article_title: In Iran Talks, Frayed Nerves, Brinkmanship, All-Nighters, Then a Deal
article_text:
LAUSANNE, Switzerland—As the first hints of dawn broke Thursday in this Swiss lakeside town, there were strained nerves in the plush salons of the luxury Beau Rivage Palais hotel, where senior diplomats from Iran, the U.S. and Washington’s negotiating partners were trying to seal a deal on Tehran’s nuclear program.

Negotiators, including U.S. Secretary of State John Kerry, U.S. Energy Secretary Ernest Moniz, Iran’s Foreign Minister Javad Zarif and top European Union official Helga Schmid, had stayed up through the night...

twitter.description: Diplomats found their way to an outline of an agreement, but gird for June.
twitter.creator: @laurnorman

Negotiators, including U.S. Secretary of State John Kerry, U.S. Energy Secretary Ernest Moniz, Iran’s Foreign Minister Javad Zarif and top European Union official Helga Schmid, had stayed up through the night...
LAUSANNE, Switzerland—As the first hints of dawn broke Thursday in this Swiss lakeside town, there were strained nerves in the plush salons of the luxury Beau Rivage Palais hotel, where senior diplomats from Iran, the U.S. and Washington’s negotiating partners were trying to seal a deal on Tehran’s nuclear program.
